content.description: Staying true to the trend of the area of being harder and more technical than it looks, this one will test your hip movement creativity. The crux is in the crazy blade/dihedral feature and might feel real hard with bad beta. Located at the far right side of The Beach, climbs just to the left of the arête.
content.protection: 3 bolts to chain anchors with fixed carabiners.

content.description: Make sure to pronounce ‘Pure Powah’ in Arnold’s voice of course. Start just to the right of Muscle Milk on a decent right hand crimp and a small left hand knob/crimp and make a big move to the obvious pod. Proceed to make more large moves on good but far apart holds. Easier if you’re taller. Stick clip the first bolt.
content.protection: 4 bolts to chain anchors with fixed carabiners.

content.description: Start as you would for Just Another Hunk but climb straight up into the dihedral. This thing has some very unique moves. Stick clip the first bolt.
content.protection: 4 bolts to chain anchors with fixed carabiners.

content.description: Fire it up right off the ground and climb through some amazing holds and movements for the grade.  Higher in the grade if you’re short. Shares an anchor with Anchor Arms. Stick clip the first bolt.
content.protection: 4 bolts to chain anchors with fixed carabiners.

content.description: Open project. Crimp your way up the slightly overhanging black face. A double draw on bolt two is handy. Stick clip the first bolt.

Just Another Hunk follows the striking rail feature on the left side of The Beach. After climbing the rail, launch into a highly technical and powerful crux that will test your bag of tricks. Stick clip the first bolt. It is also quite helpful to pre-hang draws on bolts two and three with a stick clip.
content.protection: 5 bolts to chain anchors with fixed carabiners.

content.description: A bouldery crux right off the ground leads to fun sustained climbing. Shares an anchor with Muscle Milk. Stick clip the first bolt.
content.protection: 3 bolts to chain anchors with fixed carabiners.

content.description: The Beach has the highest density of quality routes at Muscle Beach and range between 5.11 and 5.13- currently. Get ready to get your pump on!
